message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 3-8-2, translated into en
data:
For the definition of health expenditures (numerator)

  • http://www.oecd-ilibrary.org/social-issues-migration-health/a-system-of-health-accounts/classification-of-health-care-financing-schemes-icha-hf_9789264116016-9-en

For the components of health expenditures (numerator)

  • division 06 of the UN Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP) https://unstats.un.org/unsd/class/revisions/coicop_revision.asp;

For the components of household total consumption (preferred denominator)

UN Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP) https://unstats.un.org/unsd/class/revisions/coicop_revision.asp;
